channel.title: Projects on Arvind Singh Kandasi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Arvind Singh Kandasi

item.title: Project 1: Face Recognition App
item.description: Created a tool that will recognize the given image provided is a male or female. Downloaded more than 7000 photos for both male and female to trained our model. Apply PCA and Feature Engineering to build our model. Optimized SVM using GridsearchCV to reach the best model. Built a client facing Website using flask Link to Github Repository
